conversation.text: Go home and chill, I guess. I'm pretty wiped.
Hey, no judgement or anything, but don't you get tired of living at home?
Nah, it's working for me. I mostly just lay low and play a lot of games.
Plus, now that mom's dead I was thinking of turning her room into a home gym. Get on those gains, you know.
I guess that does sound pretty chill.
Well, if you ever want to visit, you know where to find me.
Will do! Good seeing you, sis.
